channel.title: Steven Gonzalez Lugo
channel.description: Recent content on Steven Gonzalez Lugo

item.title: About
item.description: Steven Gonzalez Lugo Site Under Construction About I am a Cognitive Neuroscientist recently graduated from a second master degree at the Federal University of ABC in São Paulo, Brazil. At this stage, I’m looking for opportunities to apply the knowledge acquired through my university education in applied contexts.

item.title: Distribution
item.description: Distribution License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details. Contributing If you want to contribute to this theme, you can make a pull request and I will be glad to check it out. Versioning You can modify this theme as much as you want. If you want to distribute a modified version, you must publish a link to this repository indicating that I'm the original author.

item.title: Projects
item.description: How to use (MUST READ) This is not the usual Hugo theme you can download and start adding contents right away. But don't get scared, you won't need to read all this document in order to create your site. Unless you aim to create something very customized, you just need to read the basics. Making the theme a SPA comes with some essential features you need to know before starting to build your website.
